sense.def:
Z besedo
or
povezujemo več možnosti izbire.

seg.quote: Do you want your drink up there or do you want to come down for it?
Have you any brothers or sisters?

sense.def:
Besedo
or
postavljamo pred drugo izmed dveh možnosti, kadar prvo uvaja bodisi
either
bodisi
whether
.

seg.quote: Most aircraft accidents occur at either take-off or landing.
He didn't know whether to laugh or cry.

sense.def:
Or
vključimo med dve števili, če želimo pokazati, da je količina, ki jo navajamo, približna.

seg.quote: You are supposed to polish your car three or four times a year.

sense.def:
Z besedo
or
uvedemo pripombo, s katero popravljamo ali dopolnjujemo tisto, kar smo pravkar rekli.

seg.quote: The company is paying the rent or at least contributing to it.

sense.def:
Besedo
or
uporabimo, kadar nekomu govorimo, kaj se bo zgodilo, če ne bo upošteval naših navodil ali nasveta.

seg.quote: Don't put anything plastic in the oven or it will probably start melting.

sense.def:
Z besedo
or
lahko tudi uvedemo razlago ali utemeljitev tistega, kar smo pravkar rekli.

seg.quote: He can't be that bad, can he, or they wouldn't have allowed him home.
